title: 【TCP|彪新】体表温度系统OOC
author: 彪悍的新手
txt_content:
本帖最后由 彪悍的新手 于 2016-8-22 18:03 编辑 

小故事：

从前，史蒂夫在拼搏了一晚上

好冷呀……

发现了一个熄灭的篝火

他急忙拿着打火石点燃了篝火


他蹭了上去，体表温度升高

深陷蹭篝火无法自拔致死



ooc指令：
点击复制：
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1.5 ~ {Time:1,Block:minecraft:redstone_block,Motion:[0d,-1d,0d],Passengers:[{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:minecraft:activator_rail,Passengers:[{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:blockdata ~ ~-2 ~ {auto:0b,Command:""}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"tellraw @a {"text":"","extra":[{"text":"\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n欢迎使用体温OOC\\n本OOC支持多人，选自MTA的体表温度系统。\\n作者彪悍的新手，部分系统来自LBL_CB"}]}"},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:scoreboard objectives add Temperature dummy},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar Temperature},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:scoreboard players set @a Temperature 37},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:scoreboard objectives add YC1 dummy},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:scoreboard objectives add YC2 dummy},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:scoreboard objectives add health health},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:scoreboard objectives add GB1 dummy},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"give @p minecraft:paper 64 0 {ench:[{id:19s,lvl:1s}],display:{Name:"干冰",Lore:[0:"Q键使用",]}}"},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:fill ~1 ~-1 ~0 ~10 ~0 ~6 stained_glass 11 hollow},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:fill ~1 ~-2 ~0 ~10 ~-2 ~6 purpur_block 0 hollow},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:fill ~1 ~1 ~0 ~10 ~1 ~6 purpur_block 0 {auto:1b,Command:fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~-2 ~ air}},{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:kill @e[type=MinecartCommandBlock,r=1]}]}]}复制代码




召唤阵：
@LBL_CB @End-Enderman @Java_command @MsYqgzt 
LBL做了小部分死亡提示

用法：
-100以下会死
140以上也会死
在浮冰、冰、水附近会降温
在火、岩浆、岩浆块附近水升温
会慢慢调回37度~38度
温度高会导致冰融化
温度低会导致岩浆和岩浆块冻结
干冰丢附近可以降温（急速）
本OOC选自MTA的系统
所以干冰的来源没定
（使用了懒癌卫士233）
另外，关注：
MTA地图

原理下页：



有一个计分板
用execute来加温/降温
execute @a[score_Temperature=600] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~ minecraft:fire 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=600] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~1 minecraft:fire 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=600] ~ ~ ~ detect ~1 ~ ~ minecraft:fire 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=600] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~-1 minecraft:fire 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=600] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~1 minecraft:fire 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=600] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~ minecraft:fire 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=0] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~1 minecraft:ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=0] ~ ~ ~ detect ~1 ~ ~ minecraft:ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=0] ~ ~ ~ detect ~-1 ~ ~ minecraft:ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1

execute @a[score_Temperature_min=0] ~ ~ ~ detect ~-1 ~1 ~ minecraft:ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=0] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~1 ~-1 minecraft:ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=0] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=3000] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~ minecraft:lava -1 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 2
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=-10] ~ ~ ~ detect ~1 ~ ~ minecraft:packed_ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=-10] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~1 minecraft:packed_ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=-10] ~ ~ ~ detect ~-1 ~ ~ minecraft:packed_ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=-10] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~-1 minecraft:packed_ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=-10] ~ ~ ~ detect ~1 ~1 ~ minecraft:packed_ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=-10] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~1 ~1 minecraft:packed_ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=-10] ~ ~ ~ detect ~-1 ~1 ~ minecraft:packed_ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=-10] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~1 ~-1 minecraft:packed_ice 0 scoreboard players remove @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=1000] ~ ~ ~ detect ~1 ~ ~ minecraft:magma 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=1000] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~1 minecraft:magma 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=1000] ~ ~ ~ detect ~-1 ~ ~ minecraft:magma 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=1000] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~-1 minecraft:magma 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=1000] ~ ~ ~ detect ~1 ~1 ~ minecraft:magma 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=1000] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~1 ~1 minecraft:magma 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=1000] ~ ~ ~ detect ~-1 ~1 ~ minecraft:magma 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature=1000] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~1 ~-1 minecraft:magma 0 scoreboard players add @p Temperature 1
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=50] ~ ~ ~ fill ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 ~1 ~1 ~1 water 1 replace ice 0
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=80] ~ ~ ~ fill ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 ~1 ~1 ~1 water 1 replace packed_ice 0
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=-30] ~ ~ ~ fill ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 ~1 ~1 ~1 cobblestone 0 replace magma 0
execute @a[score_Temperature_min=-50] ~ ~ ~ fill ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 ~1 ~1 ~1 stone 0 replace lava 0复制代码

然后是是高低温判断：
effect @a[score_Temperature=0] 2 1 2 true
effect @a[score_Temperature=-20] 18 2 1 true
effect @a[score_Temperature=-20] 4 2 1 true
effect @a[score_Temperature=-50] 17 2 0 true
effect @a[score_Temperature=-80] 9 2 0 true
effect @a[score_Temperature=-100] 20 2 1 true
effect @a[score_Temperature_min=45] 2 1 2 true
effect @a[score_Temperature_min=50] 18 2 1 true
effect @a[score_Temperature_min=50] 4 2 1 true
effect @a[score_Temperature_min=80] 17 2 0 true
effect @a[score_Temperature_min=100] 9 2 0 true
effect @a[score_Temperature_min=140] 20 2 1 true复制代码

死亡判定：
①给血量低于4的人贴上标签Jded
②给标签有Jded温度低于-100的贴上标签
③发高仿信息
④杀死玩家
⑤恢复温度
⑥~⑦清除标签

scoreboard players tag @a[score_health=4] add Jded
scoreboard players tag @a[score_Temperature=-100,Tag=Jded] add dded
execute @a[tag=dded] ~ ~ ~ tellraw @a {"text":"","extra":[{"selector":"@a[tag=dded]"},{"text":" 被冻死了"}]}
kill @a[tag=dded]
scoreboard players set @a[tag=dded] Temperature 37
scoreboard players tag @a[score_health_min=5] remove dded
scoreboard players tag @a remove dded复制代码

接下来同理

execute @a[score_Temperature_min=140] ~ ~ ~ /tellraw @a ["",{"selector":"@p[score_Temperature_min=140]"},{"text":" 被热死了"}]
kill @a[score_Temperature_min=140]
scoreboard players set @a[score_Temperature_min=140] Temperature 37复制代码

再见
[groupid=1009]The Command's Power[/groupid]

replies.author: xuelang123
replies.txt_content: 好6B啊表示命令渣渣看不懂，我只知道玩{:10_492:}还有楼主你弄个计分板来显示温度吧

replies.txt_content:
